about.description:
Automat is a library for concise, idiomatic Python expression of
finite-state automata (particularly deterministic finite-state
transducers).
about.summary: self-service finite-state machines for the programmer on the go

name: automat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7.0" %}

package:
  name: automat
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/A/Automat/Automat-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cbd78b83fa2d81fe2a4d23d258e1661dd7493c9a50ee2f1a5b2cac61c1793b0e

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"
  entry_points:
    - automat-visualize = automat._visualize:tool

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
    - m2r
  run:
    - python
    - attrs >=16.1.0
    - six

test:
  requires:
    - python-graphviz >0.5.1
    - twisted >=16.1.1
  imports:
    - automat
  commands:
    - automat-visualize -h

about:
  home: https://github.com/glyph/Automat
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'self-service finite-state machines for the programmer on the go'
  description: |
    Automat is a library for concise, idiomatic Python expression of
    finite-state automata (particularly deterministic finite-state
    transducers).
  doc_url: https://github.com/glyph/automat/
  dev_url: https://github.com/glyph/automat/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CJ-Wright
    - ocefpaf
